title: David Carrick and the crisis of trust in British policing
description: The conviction this week of one of Britain’s worst sex offenders in recent history was accompanied by a staggering revelation: he was a serving police officer. Emine Sinmaz and Vikram Dodd report. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: David Carrick and the crisis of trust in British policing
creator: The Guardian
